title: purple.thoughts
author: purple.thoughts
content: I am offering typing service. Convert text from images to MS word. Payment method BTC.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: purple.thoughts on June 10, 2022, 11:57:19 PMI am offering typing service. Convert text from images to MS word. Payment method BTC.Text images are usually converted to text with OCR software and then corrected. Typing them would be more work than necessary and probably higher price than necessary...Just saying...
